title: Antonio Munoz Molina - Spanish novelist (4 books)
description:
ANTONIO MUÃƒâ€˜OZ MOLINA (b. 1956) is a celebrated Spanish writer and a full member of the Royal Spanish Academy.  He currently resides in New York City.

He is the recipient of Spain's National Narrative Prize (twice, in 1987 and 1992), the Planeta Prize (1991), and the Jerusalem Prize (2013).  Margaret Sayers Peden's English-language translation of MuÃƒÂ±oz Molina's novel SEPHARAD won the PEN/Book-of-the-Month Club Translation Prize in 2004.


The following four novels are in EPUB format:

* IN HER ABSENCE (Other Press, 2006).  Translated by Esther Allen.

* IN THE NIGHT OF TIME (Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, 2013).  Translated by Edith Grossman.

* A MANUSCRIPT OF ASHES (Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, 2008).  Translated by Edith Grossman.

* SEPHARAD (Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, 2003).  Translated by Margaret Sayers Peden.
